title.rendered: Web Design Tips for Small Businesses

content.rendered:
Using the web design tips in this article can do wonders for a small business. Continue reading to find out about the latest web design trends, or contact us to get started.

Small Business Web Design Introduction

When it comes to design, every business has its own unique set of needs. All businesses, big and small, have their own brand that must be considered when designing. A business’s brand allows them to show off what makes them unique to their customers and is a clear and concise way to demonstrate what the business is all about.

When we begin our design process, it is with the intention of helping convey to your customers exactly why they should work with you. For so long, professional branding and websites have only been available to big businesses. We want to change that with our web design for small businesses offering.

Great Branding – Your Brand in your hands

Everything about your company is unique and we know that. You colors, fonts, and even the tone of your business all come together to create a completely original presentation. For a while now, small businesses have had to rely on cookie-cutter templates to embrace a professional appearance. Many branding agencies merely offered packages, or would repurpose the same old website with a few minor changes.

When we design, it is with your business and brand as the focus. You will always receive a website that has been custom-tailored to accurately present your business. The design, functionality, and content provided with the website will be created for your business specifically. Check out our portfolio and testimonials.

Making Design Easy

We understand that not everyone specializes in technology or branding, which is why we love what we do. It gives us a unique opportunity to help people who are running amazing businesses show off their companies in style. When we begin our design process, we will personally work with you to understand everything that you need to know to make educated decisions for your business. We strive to make branding easy so that you can enjoy having a website that really shows off what you bring to the table.

Making Maintenance Manageable

Every good website needs continuous maintenance to make sure that it continues to work properly. As technologies change (which is often), websites must adapt to ensure that they always perform the way that they are expected to.

Our websites are designed with easily managed maintenance options, and we are also happy to offer ongoing support if that is something that your business is interested in. Maintenance keeps websites safe, secure, and functioning correctly. Our websites are made to adapt with time, and we are always happy to help keep them up to date with a variety of helpful packages depending on the nature of your business and your needs.

Big Business Design At A Small Business Price

Even though marketing and web development are proven to dramatically improve how a business performs, not every company has the budget for a team of web developers. Fortunately, we bring big business design approaches at a price that you can afford. You don’t need to worry about hiring a new set of employees when you work with us. We are ready to work as an external extension of your team to bring you the solutions that your business needs.

Why Clio

We have helped many Calgary clients with web design for small businesses services. Here is what Canada Immigration and Visa Services (Owner Operator LMIA experts) had to say about working with Clio:

“We are pleased to provide a positive review for Nat and his team at Clio. Clio has assisted us with our IT and website needs and we are happy to recommend their services. Two thumbs up.”

Contact Clio Websites to get started today.
